paragraphs: No doubt you heard that the Dragons have been unleashed. They seek others of their kind in the deep places of the world and have even released the Demon from the East. We both knew this day would come, and we both know what it means.
The Demon from the East must be destroyed by a warrior filled with the spirit of Alkosh, as was always written. It is time to end this ancient battle, as the Pride of Alkosh was always meant to.
I hope your chosen warrior is prepared. We cannot fail.
